TopicTitle: I seem to be missing the ARM expansion...

Articles.Content:
Hey Guys and Girls,

I seem to be missing the NASA parts, R&D seems to have misplaced them . I own the game on steam and have done for a little while now, has anyone got any idea how I can fix this little issue I really want to go and capture asteroids.

Cheers, Phemnem.

If you open the Steam Library and get into KSP's Properties dialog (right click on KSP -> Properties), from the Local Files tab, select Verify Integrity of Game Cache. It should download any missing parts.
